AzureAd.TenantId: Enter the ID of your Azure AD tenant copied from the Azure portal
AzureAd.ClientId: Enter the application ID (clientId) of the 'TodoListAPI' application copied from the Azure portal
AzureAd.ClientSecret: Enter the Client Secret of the 'TodoListAPI' application copied from the Azure portal

Groups.GroupAdmin: Enter the object ID for GroupAdmin group copied from Azure Portal
Groups.GroupMember: Enter the object ID for GroupMember group copied from Azure Portal
